Now we're going to plot 5 unique krill

```{r}
ind <- unique(TotalData$D_V_T)
length(ind)

for (i in 1:length(ind)){
  hist(log10(TotalData$v[TotalData$D_V_T==ind[i]]),
     xlab = "Velocity (Log^10 mm/s)",
     main = "")
}
```
